Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with two added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of lion (lower jaw, shoulder with added red dots and part of foreleg remaining) to right.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p.290, no.877, pl. 119)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0965) (phase 2)
